title: LF Manager
body:
New team to League of Legends, expanding from Battle Field competitive play. 

Looking for someone willing to help build a new team from scratch, the players in the team will be from Diamond 1+

More details through private messages, thanks...

Add  'Nestay ' in game

replies.body:
Hi 
Just added you.
I'm interested in helping build a team. Not 100% on my responsibilities as a manager but I'm more than willing to attempt to help.
I'm not highly ranked however I know what to look for when recruiting players and analysing their playstyle.
